text:
Hi everyone :wave:

I dev a template for my quote with HubSpot and I want to change the default language because for the esign module I have this message : "Before you sign this quote, an email must be sent to you to verify your identity. Find your profile below to request a verification email."

I already change my Account default param but I didn't work :cry:
Do you know how can I do this ? (maybe with a line code in my module)

Thank you :pray:
